question: Have you ever been tempted while in a relationship? How did you handle it?

What kind of attention from others would cross a line for you?

If I looked through your phone right now, would I find anything I’d question?
When do you feel closest to me?
What’s something small I do that makes you smile inside?

What’s one memory of us that you replay in your head?
What part of yourself are you currently working on?
